function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to contagious diseases through physical contact in the built environment","Impact":"Spread of diseases leading to illness and potential fatalities","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, vaccinations, and social distancing measures","Technologies":"Air purifiers, disinfection robots, and IoT sensors for occupancy tracking","People":"Occupants of built environments, including office workers, students, and residents","Owner":"Building administrators, employers, and public health officials"}]}
